summary: An ordinance relating to and providing for the condemnation of Lots 6, 7, 8, 14, 15 and 16 of Block 11, Cove Addition for Park and Playground purposes and providing that the entire cost of such improvement shall be paid by special assessments on the property specially benefited, or from such fund as the City Council of the City of Seattle may direct, or by both special assessment and such fund.
